mapper.select: SELECT m1.userId, userName, pwd, NVL(grade, 0) grade, email, tel, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, addr1, addr2, gender FROM member1 m1 LEFT OUTER JOIN member2 m2 ON m1.userId = m2.userId WHERE m1.userId = #{userId} AND grade != 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member1 (userId, pwd, grade, userName) VALUES (#{userId}, #{pwd}, #{grade}, #{userName})
INSERT INTO member2 (userId, tel, email, postNum, addr1, addr2, birth, gender) VALUES (#{userId}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{postNum}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{birth}, #{gender})
